CustomField.formula:
TEXT( MONTH( DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c) ) ) & "/" & TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c) ) ) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c) ) ) &' '& IF ( DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c) >= DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c)),3,1) + ( 14- CASE( MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c)),3,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) , 0,7,MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c)),3,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7)) ) && DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c) < DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c)),11,1) + ( 7- CASE( MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c)),11,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) , 0,7,MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(ArrivalWindow__c)),11,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7)) ),
IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 15, 2 )& " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ),
IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 15, 2 )& " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( ArrivalWindow__c), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ))
CustomField.label: Service Arrival Window
